backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries linking features to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten one‑sentence summaries for various frontend files.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and OKLCH color variables for light/dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and wraps the app with a dark ThemeProvider and Toaster.
Renders incoming or outgoing neon‑styled chat bubbles.
frontend/src/components/chat/MessageInpu: Message input form with controlled text field and send button.
frontend/src/components/layout/NeonScaff: Provides background image, gradient overlay, and Outlet container for all pages.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches backend actor instances based on Internet Identity and manages query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context, login/clear logic, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/usePwaInstallPrompt.t: Captures beforeinstallprompt events and exposes installability and a trigger function.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file for future backend‑related React Query hooks.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup defining neon theme variables and custom glow/border utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps React app with QueryClientProvider, InternetIdentityProvider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/ChatScreen.tsx: Implements the main chat UI with a header, message list, and input bar, handling sending messages and navigation to premium and download pages.
frontend/src/pages/DownloadInstallScreen: Provides a download/install screen with PWA install handling, link copying, and navigation back to the chat screen.
frontend/src/pages/PremiumScreen.tsx: Displays premium feature previews with a hero badge, feature list, upgrade button, and navigation back to the chat screen.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, animations, typography, container settings, and plugins for the app's neon theme.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata including scope, features, known issues, and architectural notes for the Jero Chat app.
